content.title: Talk to us
content.subtitle: We are here to assist you with any issues or queries you may have

Data.questions: How does CW Store Inventory ensure real-time visibility of stock?
Data.answer: CW Store Inventory integrates all inventory data across multiple locations, providing live updates and ensuring that current stock levels are always accessible, facilitating better inventory management.

Data.questions: Can inventory be transferred between stores using CW Store Inventory?
Data.answer: Absolutely, the system streamlines the process for inter-store transfers, allowing for efficient rebalancing of stock levels between different store locations.

Data.questions: Is inventory data accessible across different sales channels?
Data.answer: Yes, CW Store Inventory maintains inventory visibility across all sales channels, ensuring that stock information is consistent and up-to-date whether accessed online or in-store.

Data.questions: How does the system alert to low stock or replenishment needs?
Data.answer: The system is equipped with automated alerts that notify you when stock levels are low or when replenishment is necessary, helping prevent stockouts and maintain optimal inventory levels.

Data.questions: How can I easily identify items that are low in stock?
Data.answer: You can identify low stock items quickly by generating a low-stock report directly from the system, which helps you act promptly to address inventory needs.

Data.questions: Where can I find information on top-selling locations?
Data.answer: Information on top-selling locations can be accessed easily from the systemâ€™s dashboard, providing valuable insights that can inform strategic decisions and inventory distribution.
